name: Real Crime - Chase The Thief 3D
description:
Troubled times have come. In order to protect the corn from the invasion of thiefs - you are hired, an experienced hunter. Everything for your services - offroad 4x4 car and your trained dog. That's all you need.

Remember that when your leds are on - you are more visible, as well keep in mind ticking time, so press on the pedal or get out of the car and let your dog run!

Great environment and excellent 3D graphics attached!
